The game is alright, and not as unfair as people make it out to be. If you are struggling with killer camp/tunnel more. If you are having trouble with survivor, bring boons and exhaustion perks. Trust me just begin to play unfair at the end of the day it doesn't matter.
I used to play this game with friends, even bought the game for one of them, but then they just stopped playing. Not sure if it was me, or the game but yeah. Still a fun game though.

Scary games, like I love horror games even tho it is  tough to win the game as a survivor. This one gives me a lot of stress and I LIKE it. They also update regularly which is a plus.

This game gets worse and worse. After the recent update the game is basically unplayable. Beside the lack of fun it just feels horrible to play this game. After 2.5k hrs I came to the conclusion to uninstall the game. But before I leave I want to point out a few things and why I think that it needs to be changed before i consider reinstalling the game:

1. Revert unnecessary changes to killers: F.e. Hillbilly nerf
2. make every killer equally strong (buff weaker killers, nerf strongest)
3. Give stronger killers more counterplay
4. Reward killer and survivors for playing fair / more punishment for unfair players
5. Fix serverlatency/hitboxes
6. Listen to the community !!!! (We are the people who play the game not the devs -_-)
7. Make the game more fun in general for both sides
8. Fix matchmaking
9. Stop RNG based map design. Instead create a balanced layout for every map.
10. Rework killers who are unfun to play as and against (Deathslinger, Bubba, Freddy, Spirit)

I could probably continue but those are the most important changes the game needs in my eyes.
If you are the fan about hide & seek, just try this game. you won't regert

Great atmosphere, great assymetrical multiplayer game.

New players will find it hard to play matches as Killer (long wait times and survivors with great perks playinjg against you) and may have trouble playing as survivors in the beginning against Killers with the best perks.

Still, it's an awesome game

Great game, at its most fun when you can get a custom lobby and mess around with friends, but the casual matchmaking is quite good too, relatively fast for how long the game has been out. The Devs are putting more content out so this game still has a healthy pulse! (you will too after a few rounds)
Tricky to get a hang of perks/what is popular and how to play against some of the horrors that chase you and what builds they also use but overall i'd recommend this to anyone who likes these games where you escape a killer (or be the killer you psycho's) or to a bunch of people wanting to play somthing fun together.
Game runs VERY smoothly, haven't had an issue yet and it loads up within a minute.
Brilliant game i enjoy playing as survivor, it can be stressful at times but overall really fun to play.
Since the 3.0 patch the game has been really fun.

Вообщем всё было чётко. Первое время не мог запустить из-за античита. Но как странно... В этом мне помог фортнайт, скачав тот самый античит и позволив играть мне в эту жопораздерающую игру.
Даю восемь повешаний на крюк из десяти.
I've put over 44 hours into this game! Its amazing would definitely recommend!!!!
Some people are toxic, some people aren't, idk though, unequip ruin please, noed is a cruch.
A game that you will hate, but also a game that you will love.

This is a very fun game, but prepare to die a lot if you're playing a survivor. The learning curve is steep, the game is hard and unforgiving.

If you're looking for a frustrating at first game which gets more and more fun the more experience you get, this game is for you. With over 400 hours in the game I am not feeling burned out yet. Mostly because I am still learning and noticing improvement.

If you're wanting to get a good idea of how the game is played at high level and/or improve your gameplay I'd recommend the Twitch stream from Tru3talent (not me), he's one of the best killer players in the game and always says why he does stuff to teach his viewers how the game works.
Worst community ever, i love it

This game is great! If you like to be scared this game is for you. There is a lot of chasing in this game and when you outwit your enemy and escape, that is a great feeling. The game is different every time, depending on who your playing with. You will find yourself returning to this game often if you buy it.
